He vows to use his abilities to fight crime, coming to understand the words of his beloved Uncle Ben: "With great power comes great responsibility."

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: When a failed nuclear fusion experiment results in an explosion that kills his wife, Dr. Otto Octavius (Alfred Molina) is transformed into Dr. Octopus, a cyborg with deadly metal tentacles. Doc Ock blames Spider-Man (Tobey Maguire) for the accident and seeks revenge. Meanwhile, Spidey's alter ego, Peter Parker, faces fading powers and self-doubt. Complicating matters are his best friend's (James Franco) hatred for Spider-Man and his true love's (Kirsten Dunst) sudden engagement to another man.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Peter Parker (Tobey Maguire) and M.J. (Kirsten Dunst) seem to finally be on the right track in their complicated relationship, but trouble looms for the superhero and his lover. Peter's Spider-Man suit turns black and takes control of him, not only giving Peter enhanced power but also bringing out the dark side of his personality. Peter must overcome the suit's influence as two supervillains, Sandman and Venom, rise up to destroy him and all those he holds dear.

programme.title: Little Charmers
programme.desc: The girls do a freeze dance to bring on the cold weather, and Charmville becomes unbearably cold; the girls disguise a delicious-smelling gingerbread boy so that no one eats him.

programme.title: Little Charmers
programme.desc: Hazel and the Charmers go to the pumpkin patch in search of the best pumpkins on Spooky Pumpkin Moon Night.

programme.title: Titan A.E.
programme.desc: A science-fiction film that combines traditional animation with computer generated images, "Titan A.E." takes place in the distant future, after Earth has been obliterated by a mysterious alien race known as the Drej. Cale is a human teenager who has been given a mysterious map by his father, leading him on an unforgettable journey.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: "Spider-Man" centers on student Peter Parker (Tobey Maguire) who, after being bitten by a genetically-altered spider, gains superhuman strength and the spider-like ability to cling to any surface. He vows to use his abilities to fight crime, coming to understand the words of his beloved Uncle Ben: "With great power comes great responsibility."

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: When a failed nuclear fusion experiment results in an explosion that kills his wife, Dr. Otto Octavius (Alfred Molina) is transformed into Dr. Octopus, a cyborg with deadly metal tentacles. Doc Ock blames Spider-Man (Tobey Maguire) for the accident and seeks revenge. Meanwhile, Spidey's alter ego, Peter Parker, faces fading powers and self-doubt. Complicating matters are his best friend's (James Franco) hatred for Spider-Man and his true love's (Kirsten Dunst) sudden engagement to another man.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Peter Parker (Tobey Maguire) and M.J. (Kirsten Dunst) seem to finally be on the right track in their complicated relationship, but trouble looms for the superhero and his lover. Peter's Spider-Man suit turns black and takes control of him, not only giving Peter enhanced power but also bringing out the dark side of his personality. Peter must overcome the suit's influence as two supervillains, Sandman and Venom, rise up to destroy him and all those he holds dear.

programme.title: Wild America
programme.desc: The fearless young Stouffer brothers -- Marty (Scott Bairstow), Mark (Devon Sawa) and Marshall (Jonathan Taylor Thomas) -- can hardly imagine going into the family business hawking auto parts in small-town Arkansas. With the begrudging approval of their no-nonsense father, the brothers set out on a dangerous cross-country camping trip, intending to capture on film their encounters with wild animals and the last remnants of the natural world in the rapidly vanishing American West.

programme.title: Buttons: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: Two orphan girls have only one wish: to find a home for Christmas. With a little help from their guardian angels, they discover that miracles really can happen when you find the power to believe.

programme.title: Pit Pony
programme.desc: A horse's companionship helps a boy (Ben Rose-Davis) overcome his fears and work in a Nova Scotia coal mine to support his family.

programme.title: Wheely
programme.desc: In a world where cars are citizens, an underdog cabbie named Wheely tries to become king of the road of Gasket City.

programme.title: My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising
programme.desc: Deku and the rest of the heroes of Class 1-A must save a group of islanders from a powerful villain.

programme.title: Wild America
programme.desc: The fearless young Stouffer brothers -- Marty (Scott Bairstow), Mark (Devon Sawa) and Marshall (Jonathan Taylor Thomas) -- can hardly imagine going into the family business hawking auto parts in small-town Arkansas. With the begrudging approval of their no-nonsense father, the brothers set out on a dangerous cross-country camping trip, intending to capture on film their encounters with wild animals and the last remnants of the natural world in the rapidly vanishing American West.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Buddy (Will Ferrell) was accidentally transported to the North Pole as a toddler and raised to adulthood among Santa's elves. Unable to shake the feeling that he doesn't fit in, the adult Buddy travels to New York, in full elf uniform, in search of his real father. As it happens, this is Walter Hobbs (James Caan), a cynical businessman. After a DNA test proves this, Walter reluctantly attempts to start a relationship with the childlike Buddy with increasingly chaotic results.

programme.title: Buttons: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: Two orphan girls have only one wish: to find a home for Christmas. With a little help from their guardian angels, they discover that miracles really can happen when you find the power to believe.

programme.title: My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising
programme.desc: Deku and the rest of the heroes of Class 1-A must save a group of islanders from a powerful villain.

programme.title: Little Charmers
programme.desc: Hazel charms an old toy that belonged to her mother; Hazel wants the Charmers' band to be the best in the talent show.

programme.title: Little Charmers
programme.desc: While trying to add something special to their fashion show outfits, the girls' magic gives them an unexpected result; Hazel makes special lockets for Posie and Lavender.

programme.title: Wild America
programme.desc: The fearless young Stouffer brothers -- Marty (Scott Bairstow), Mark (Devon Sawa) and Marshall (Jonathan Taylor Thomas) -- can hardly imagine going into the family business hawking auto parts in small-town Arkansas. With the begrudging approval of their no-nonsense father, the brothers set out on a dangerous cross-country camping trip, intending to capture on film their encounters with wild animals and the last remnants of the natural world in the rapidly vanishing American West.

programme.title: Volcano
programme.desc: When a massive earthquake rocks the city of Los Angeles, Emergency Management department head Mike Roark (Tommy Lee Jones) returns from his vacation to help with the city's response. After geologist Dr. Amy Barnes (Anne Heche) warns that a volcano may be forming in sewer tunnels, another severe earthquake unleashes the lava flowing underfoot, threatening to destroy the whole city. As the fiery molten rock runs through the streets, Roark and Barnes must figure out how to divert it.

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
programme.desc: Following the terrorist attacks of Sept. 11, 2001, Osama bin Laden becomes one of the most-wanted men on the planet. The worldwide manhunt for the terrorist leader occupies the resources and attention of two U.S. presidential administrations. Ultimately, it is the work of a dedicated female operative (Jessica Chastain) that proves instrumental in finally locating bin Laden. In May 2011, Navy SEALs launch a nighttime strike, killing bin Laden in his compound in Abbottabad, Pakistan.

programme.title: The Professional
programme.desc: Mathilda (Natalie Portman) is only 12 years old, but is already familiar with the dark side of life: her abusive father stores drugs for corrupt police officers, and her mother neglects her. Léon (Jean Reno), who lives down the hall, tends to his houseplants and works as a hired hitman for mobster Tony (Danny Aiello). When her family is murdered by crooked DEA agent Stansfield (Gary Oldman), Mathilda joins forces with a reluctant Léon to learn his deadly trade and avenge her family's deaths.

programme.title: Heist
programme.desc: Joe Moore (Gene Hackman) has a job he loves. He's a thief. His job goes sour when he gets caught on security camera tape. His fence, Bergman (Danny DeVito) reneges on the money he's owed, and his wife (Rebecca Pidgeon) may be betraying him with the fence's young lieutenant (Sam Rockwell). Moore and his partner, Bobby Blane (Delroy Lindo) and their utility man, Pinky Pincus (Ricky Jay) find themselves broke, betrayed, and blackmailed. Moore is forced to commit his crew to do one last big job.

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: A detective investigates a murder scene that has a connection to a case that her new partner handled in the past. The killings occurred in a haunted house that passes on a ghostly curse to those who dare enter it. Soon, the curse spreads to a terminally ill woman and her husband, and another unsuspecting couple who were in the wrong place at the wrong time.

programme.title: The Stranger
programme.desc: Immediately following World War II, ex-Nazi Franz Kindler (Orson Welles) is living under a false identity as a teacher in a small Connecticut town, and has even married the headmaster's daughter (Loretta Young) as part of his cover. But when one of Kindler's old German associates (Konstantin Shayne) arrives unexpectedly in town, bringing in his wake a sly federal investigator (Edward G. Robinson), Kindler resorts to desperate measures to preserve his secret.

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature violently kills a man in a Maine lake, Jack Wells (Bill Pullman), the local game warden, looks into the bizarre case, along with Sheriff Hank Keough (Brendan Gleeson) and visiting paleontologist Kelly Scott (Bridget Fonda). Looking for clues in a tooth that the beast left behind, Kelly and the others eventually locate the monster, a massive and vicious reptile eager to devour anything in its path. Can the crocodile-like creature be stopped?

programme.title: Piranha 3D
programme.desc: Spring break turns gory when an underground tremor releases hundreds of prehistoric, carnivorous fish into Lake Victoria, a popular waterside resort. Local cop Julie Forester (Elisabeth Shue) must join forces with a band of unlikely strangers -- though they are badly outnumbered -- to destroy the ravenous creatures before everyone becomes fish food.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Abandoned by his parents and raised by an aunt and uncle, teenager Peter Parker (Andrew Garfield), AKA Spider-Man, is trying to sort out who he is and exactly what his feelings are for his first crush, Gwen Stacy (Emma Stone). When Peter finds a mysterious briefcase that was his father's, he pursues a quest to solve his parents' disappearance. His search takes him to Oscorp and the lab of Dr. Curt Connors (Rhys Ifans), setting him on a collision course with Connors' alter ego, the Lizard.

programme.title: The Professional
programme.desc: Mathilda (Natalie Portman) is only 12 years old, but is already familiar with the dark side of life: her abusive father stores drugs for corrupt police officers, and her mother neglects her. Léon (Jean Reno), who lives down the hall, tends to his houseplants and works as a hired hitman for mobster Tony (Danny Aiello). When her family is murdered by crooked DEA agent Stansfield (Gary Oldman), Mathilda joins forces with a reluctant Léon to learn his deadly trade and avenge her family's deaths.

When Peter finds a mysterious briefcase that was his father's, he pursues a quest to solve his parents' disappearance. His search takes him to Oscorp and the lab of Dr. Curt Connors (Rhys Ifans), setting him on a collision course with Connors' alter ego, the Lizard.

programme.desc: Joe Moore (Gene Hackman) has a job he loves. He's a thief. His job goes sour when he gets caught on security camera tape. His fence, Bergman (Danny DeVito) reneges on the money he's owed, and his wife (Rebecca Pidgeon) may be betraying him with the fence's young lieutenant (Sam Rockwell). Moore and his partner, Bobby Blane (Delroy Lindo) and their utility man, Pinky Pincus (Ricky Jay) find themselves broke, betrayed, and blackmailed. Moore is forced to commit his crew to do one last big job.

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: A Navy pilot (Owen Wilson) is shot down over enemy territory, and struggles to survive the relentless pursuit of a ruthless secret police enforcer, a deadly tracker, and countless hostile troops. With time running out, the injured pilot's commanding officer (Gene Hackman) goes against orders to carry out a desperate rescue mission.

programme.title: The 6th Day
programme.desc: A world of the very near future in which cattle, fish and even family pet can be cloned. But cloning humans is illegal -- that is until family man Adam Gibson comes home from work one day to find a clone has replaced him. Taken from his family and plunged into a sinister world he doesn't understand, Gibson must not only save himself from the assassins who must now destroy him to protect their secret, but uncover who and what is behind the horrible things happening to him.

programme.title: The Hit List
programme.desc: An angry man creates a hit list with a stranger during a drunken night, then scrambles to save the people on it when they start getting killed.

programme.title: Blumhouse's Fantasy Island
programme.desc: The enigmatic Mr. Roarke makes the secret dreams of his guests come true at a luxurious tropical resort. But when the fantasies turn into nightmares, the visitors must soon solve the island's mystery in order to escape with their lives.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: After a workplace shooting in New Orleans, a trial against the gun manufacturer pits lawyer Wendell Rohr (Dustin Hoffman) against shady jury consultant Rankin Fitch (Gene Hackman), who uses illegal means to stack the jury with people sympathetic to the defense. But when juror Nicholas Easter (John Cusack) and his girlfriend, Marlee (Rachel Weisz), reveal their ability to sway the jury into delivering any verdict they want, a high-stakes cat-and-mouse game begins.

programme.title: Driven
programme.desc: FBI informant Jim Hoffman lures troubled automobile magnate John DeLorean to an undercover sting for cocaine trafficking.

programme.title: The Devil Has a Name
programme.desc: An ambitious oil executive leaves the whole industry exposed when she tries to outwit a recently widowed farmer whose land has been poisoned.

programme.title: The 6th Day
programme.desc: A world of the very near future in which cattle, fish and even family pet can be cloned. But cloning humans is illegal -- that is until family man Adam Gibson comes home from work one day to find a clone has replaced him. Taken from his family and plunged into a sinister world he doesn't understand, Gibson must not only save himself from the assassins who must now destroy him to protect their secret, but uncover who and what is behind the horrible things happening to him.

programme.title: Blumhouse's Fantasy Island
programme.desc: The enigmatic Mr. Roarke makes the secret dreams of his guests come true at a luxurious tropical resort. But when the fantasies turn into nightmares, the visitors must soon solve the island's mystery in order to escape with their lives.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part 2
programme.desc: The second entry in the long-running horror series focuses on a group of teenage would-be counselors converging on Camp Crystal Lake for training under the tutelage of head counselor Paul (John Furey). Inevitably, Paul relates the story of Jason Voorhees (Warrington Gillette), a boy who ostensibly drowned at the camp and whose mother murdered a group of counselors in revenge. No one takes the tale seriously until a very much alive Jason begins gruesomely eliminating people.

programme.title: The Hit List
programme.desc: An angry man creates a hit list with a stranger during a drunken night, then scrambles to save the people on it when they start getting killed.

programme.title: Driven
programme.desc: FBI informant Jim Hoffman lures troubled automobile magnate John DeLorean to an undercover sting for cocaine trafficking.

programme.title: Blumhouse's Fantasy Island
programme.desc: The enigmatic Mr. Roarke makes the secret dreams of his guests come true at a luxurious tropical resort. But when the fantasies turn into nightmares, the visitors must soon solve the island's mystery in order to escape with their lives.

programme.title: The Devil Has a Name
programme.desc: An ambitious oil executive leaves the whole industry exposed when she tries to outwit a recently widowed farmer whose land has been poisoned.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: After a workplace shooting in New Orleans, a trial against the gun manufacturer pits lawyer Wendell Rohr (Dustin Hoffman) against shady jury consultant Rankin Fitch (Gene Hackman), who uses illegal means to stack the jury with people sympathetic to the defense. But when juror Nicholas Easter (John Cusack) and his girlfriend, Marlee (Rachel Weisz), reveal their ability to sway the jury into delivering any verdict they want, a high-stakes cat-and-mouse game begins.

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Crystal Lake's history of murder doesn't deter counselors from setting up a summer camp in the woodsy area. Superstitious locals warn against it, but the fresh-faced young people -- Jack (Kevin Bacon), Alice (Adrienne King), Bill (Harry Crosby), Marcie (Jeannine Taylor) and Ned (Mark Nelson) -- pay little heed to the old-timers. Then they find themselves stalked by a brutal killer. As they're slashed, shot and stabbed, the counselors struggle to stay alive against a merciless opponent.

programme.title: The Negotiator
programme.desc: Danny Roman (Samuel L. Jackson) is considered the best police hostage negotiator in Chicago. After a friend warns him that someone is embezzling from a disability fund, the person is found dead. Internal affairs investigator Niebaum (J.T. Walsh) discovers the gun used had been handled by Roman. When no one believes his innocence, Roman takes Niebaum hostage. When Chris Sabian (Kevin Spacey) arrives to hear Roman's demands, the two skilled negotiators begin a tense stand-off.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Sarah (Elizabeth Olsen) is working with her father (Adam Trese) and uncle (Eric Sheffer Stevens) to renovate an old family home to prepare it for sale. Long vacant, the house has no utilities, forcing the trio to rely on battery-operated lanterns to light their way. Sarah becomes separated from her relatives and soon finds she is trapped inside the cabin, with no contact with the outside world. Panic turns to real terror as the young woman experiences events that become increasingly ominous.

programme.title: Man's Best Friend
programme.desc: Reporter Lori Tanner (Ally Sheedy), investigating a story about animal cruelty, gains access to a facility where dogs and cats are the subjects of cruel experiments conducted by Dr. Jarret (Lance Henriksen). After seeing the conditions of the lab, Lori flees the building, but massive escaped dog Max follows her. Lori decides to keep Max as a pet, but the seemingly lovable canine is a genetically altered dog with unusual abilities and psychotic tendencies that set him on a killing spree.

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Crystal Lake's history of murder doesn't deter counselors from setting up a summer camp in the woodsy area. Superstitious locals warn against it, but the fresh-faced young people -- Jack (Kevin Bacon), Alice (Adrienne King), Bill (Harry Crosby), Marcie (Jeannine Taylor) and Ned (Mark Nelson) -- pay little heed to the old-timers. Then they find themselves stalked by a brutal killer. As they're slashed, shot and stabbed, the counselors struggle to stay alive against a merciless opponent.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: Deirdre (Natascha McElhone) puts together a team of experts that she tasks with stealing a valuable briefcase, the contents of which are a mystery. The international team includes Sam (Robert De Niro), an ex-intelligence officer, along with Vincent (Jean Reno), Gregor (Stellan Skarsgard) and others. As their operation gets underway, several team members are found to be untrustworthy, and everyone must complete the mission with a watchful eye on everyone else.

programme.title: L.A. Confidential
programme.desc: Three policemen, each with his own motives and obsessions, tackle the corruption surrounding an unsolved murder at a downtown Los Angeles coffee shop in the early 1950s. Detective Lieutenant Exley (Guy Pearce), the son of a murdered detective, is out to avenge his father's killing. The ex-partner of Officer White (Russell Crowe), implicated in a scandal rooted out by Exley, was one of the victims. Sergeant Vincennes (Kevin Spacey) feeds classified information to a tabloid magnate (Danny DeVito).

programme.title: Man's Best Friend
programme.desc: Reporter Lori Tanner (Ally Sheedy), investigating a story about animal cruelty, gains access to a facility where dogs and cats are the subjects of cruel experiments conducted by Dr. Jarret (Lance Henriksen). After seeing the conditions of the lab, Lori flees the building, but massive escaped dog Max follows her. Lori decides to keep Max as a pet, but the seemingly lovable canine is a genetically altered dog with unusual abilities and psychotic tendencies that set him on a killing spree.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: Deirdre (Natascha McElhone) puts together a team of experts that she tasks with stealing a valuable briefcase, the contents of which are a mystery. The international team includes Sam (Robert De Niro), an ex-intelligence officer, along with Vincent (Jean Reno), Gregor (Stellan Skarsgard) and others. As their operation gets underway, several team members are found to be untrustworthy, and everyone must complete the mission with a watchful eye on everyone else.

programme.title: The Negotiator
programme.desc: Danny Roman (Samuel L. Jackson) is considered the best police hostage negotiator in Chicago. After a friend warns him that someone is embezzling from a disability fund, the person is found dead. Internal affairs investigator Niebaum (J.T. Walsh) discovers the gun used had been handled by Roman. When no one believes his innocence, Roman takes Niebaum hostage. When Chris Sabian (Kevin Spacey) arrives to hear Roman's demands, the two skilled negotiators begin a tense stand-off.

programme.title: The Take
programme.desc: Deep in the slums of Los Angeles, good-natured Felix De La Pena (John Alberto Leguizamo), a family man and armored vehicle driver, is shot in the head during a hijacking attempt gone wrong. Though his wife, Marina (Rosie Perez), offers her love and support, Felix suffers from intense physical and emotional pain following the attack. As he begins to recover, he learns he has been framed for the stick-up; distraught, Felix decides to find the real culprit himself, despite his failing health and memory.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity
programme.desc: Soon after moving into a suburban tract home, Katie (Katie Featherston) and Micah (Micah Sloat) become increasingly disturbed by what appears to be a supernatural presence. Hoping to capture evidence of it on film, they set up video cameras in the house but are not prepared for the terrifying events that follow.

programme.title: French Connection II
programme.desc: This sequel to William Friedkin's 1971 crime drama finds Detective "Popeye" Doyle (Gene Hackman) still hot on the trail of slippery drug trafficker Charnier (Fernando Rey), but this time in Marseilles, France. Uprooted from his familiar New York City beat, Doyle struggles to assert himself in a strange city and break the drug ring wide open. When Charnier's goons force him into a heroin addiction, the tough cop must summon every ounce of his courage to kick the habit cold turkey.

programme.title: The Newton Boys
programme.desc: Seeking an escape from poverty, sibling Texas farmers (Matthew McConaughey, Skeet Ulrich, Ethan Hawke) gain notoriety as daring 1920s bank robbers.

programme.title: Under Suspicion
programme.desc: "Under Suspicion" is an intense, psychological thriller, with veteran Police Captain Victor Benezet squaring off against prominent tax attorney Henry Hearst -- two life-hardened and well-matched opponents motivated by reasons more complex and personal than the pursuit of duty or the defense of reputation. Exploring the darkest recesses of the human imagination, bringing to light the dangerous psychological ramifications of a guilty conscience.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A.
programme.desc: In 2013, the United States president (Cliff Robertson) is exiling all citizens who don't conform to his hyper-conservative views to Los Angeles, which became an island after a huge earthquake. But, when the president's daughter nabs the detonator to her dad's apocalyptic weapon and sneaks into L.A. to be with the rebel leader she loves, the government taps commando-turned-crook Snake Plissken (Kurt Russell) to retrieve the young woman. And, if he doesn't succeed quickly, he'll be executed.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow
programme.desc: Set in 1799, "Sleepy Hollow" is based on Washington Irving's classic tale "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow." Faithful to the dreamy custom-bound world that Irving paints in his story, the film mixes horror, fantasy and romance and features an extraordinary cast of characters that dabble in the supernatural.

programme.title: Juan of the Dead
programme.desc: When the dead rise and attack the living, Juan starts a zombie-killing business, until he has to save his small band from being eaten.

programme.title: End of Watch
programme.desc: Longtime LAPD partners and friends, Brian Taylor (Jake Gyllenhaal) and Mike Zavala (Michael Peña) patrol one of the most dangerous neighborhoods in Los Angeles. Though they may bend the rules, their honor and dedication to the job are unquestioned. Taylor and Zavala always have each other's back, even if Taylor's surreptitious filming of their daily activities for a college course is a bit ill-advised. All hell breaks loose for the officers when they run afoul of a vicious Mexican cartel.

programme.title: Pacific Heights
programme.desc: Unmarried yuppies Patty (Melanie Griffith) and Drake (Matthew Modine) move into an expensive dream home in a high-end neighborhood in San Francisco. As they renovate the house, they look for a tenant for the first floor of their house. Carter Hayes (Michael Keaton) seems like a great fit at first, but it transpires that he is a con artist who plans to swindle them out of their real estate. As Hayes tries to drive them out of their own home, the couple must take drastic measures to fight back.

programme.title: Under Suspicion
programme.desc: "Under Suspicion" is an intense, psychological thriller, with veteran Police Captain Victor Benezet squaring off against prominent tax attorney Henry Hearst -- two life-hardened and well-matched opponents motivated by reasons more complex and personal than the pursuit of duty or the defense of reputation. Exploring the darkest recesses of the human imagination, bringing to light the dangerous psychological ramifications of a guilty conscience.

programme.title: Navidad en Holly Lane
programme.desc: Tres amigos de la infancia, cada uno en una encrucijada diferente en sus vidas, se reúnen en Navidad. Al regresar a la casa de Sarah, donde compartieron muchos recuerdos, ellos intentan salvar la casa con la esperanza de tener más Navidades juntos.

programme.title: El camino a la Navidad
programme.desc: Maggie Baker, productora de televisión de Los Ángeles, se enamora de Danny Wise, el exproductor del especial de Navidad de su madre.

programme.title: El árbol en el techo
programme.desc: Sarah y John, dos abogados, colaboran en la defensa de un hombre muy terco que cada Navidad es encarcelado por colocar un árbol en su tejado y decorarlo para celebrar las fiestas.

programme.title: Confesiones de Navidad
programme.desc: Beth, una actriz fracasada, regresa de Nueva York a su localidad de origen por Navidad. Beth está sumida en la tristeza de revelar a sus familiares y amigas que no logró su sueño; sin embargo, su situación y sus prioridades en la vida cambian cuando inesperadamente encuentra el amor.

programme.title: Una Navidad para recordar
programme.desc: La hija de un magnate será la nueva imagen de la marca, pero no es capaz de hacer ninguna de las cosas por las que su madre era conocida.

programme.title: Navidad en la posada
programme.desc: Una actriz se dirige a Homestead en Iowa, un pueblo obsesionado por la Navidad, para rodar una película sobre esta festividad. Ella queda sorprendida cuando el amor florece entre ella y Matt, un padre soltero, y a medida que experimenta la vida de la pequeña ciudad, descubre el verdadero significado de la Navidad.

programme.title: El árbol en el techo
programme.desc: Sarah y John, dos abogados, colaboran en la defensa de un hombre muy terco que cada Navidad es encarcelado por colocar un árbol en su tejado y decorarlo para celebrar las fiestas.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Mark Ruffalo, Will Smith, Michael Caine, Benico Del Toro, Samuel L. Jackson y Joel Edgerton hablan acerca de sus carreras.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Los actores de las películas más fascinantes revelan qué es lo que aman de la actuación.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Siete actrices hablan sobre qué las inspiró a dedicarse a la actuación y cuentan cómo es trabajar con los mejores directores de Hollywood.

programme.title: Tú eres todo lo que quiero para Navidad de Mariah Carey
programme.desc: Una niña quiere con todas sus fuerzas un cachorrito para Navidad. Para demostrar que es responsable, acepta cuidar el perro de su tío.

programme.title: Galletas de Navidad
programme.desc: Una ejecutiva es enviada en Navidad a un pequeño pueblo para comprar una compañía productora de galletas y cerrar su fábrica. Una vez allá, la mujer se enamora del propietario de la fábrica, y el espíritu navideño la cambia por completo.

programme.title: El César
programme.desc: La crónica de un país que vio al ídolo caer y a un hombre levantarse. La vida del boxeador Julio César Chávez, el púgil que batió a todos sus rivales pero estando en lo más alto encontró a los enemigos más duros de vencer: las drogas y el alcohol.

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: Conan, un poderoso guerrero cimmerio, recorre un camino sangriento a través de las tierras de Hyboria en una venganza personal. Eso muy pronto se transforma en una batalla épica en contra de su malvado enemigo mortal Khalar Zym, quien busca la legendaria Máscara de Acheron. El artefacto le permite a Khalar Zym revivir a su esposa y obtener la inmortalidad, pero pronto libera una fuerza malévola y sólo Conan y sus compañeros pueden detenerlo.

programme.title: Patriots Day
programme.desc: Después de los atentados en el maratón de Boston, el sargento de policía Tommy Saunders, el agente especial del FBI Richard DesLauriers y el comisionado Ed Davis ayudan a los supervivientes, socorristas y otros investigadores en una carrera contra el tiempo para encontrar a los sospechosos del ataque.

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Ray Breslin, un experto en seguridad carcelaria, se enfrenta a su mayor reto: escapar de la prisión que él mismo ha diseñado. En la cárcel conocerá al enigmático Church, un hombre que se ha ganado el respeto de todos los presos.

programme.desc: Catalina acepta el regalo de Gato Gordo y luego engaña a sus padres, diciéndoles que se ganó la moto en una rifa, para que no sospechen en los pasos que anda.

programme.title: Flor salvaje
programme.desc: Con ayuda de Lourdes, Mariano le hace una mala jugada a su hermana durante el debate. Sacramento y Amanda tienen éxito en su negocio, pero los celos causan problemas. Malicia toca fondo.

programme.title: Flor salvaje
programme.desc: Rafael está lleno de odio. Ejecuta su venganza contra Catalina y le cobra lo pendiente a Barba Roja. Catalina enfrenta a Sacramento y se siente traicionada. Abelardo le cuenta todo a Amanda.

programme.title: La torre oscura
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, el último pistolero, persigue a Walter O'Dim, quien pretende destruir la Torre Oscura, un edificio mágico cuya desaparición acarrearía la desintegración del universo. Su batalla, que transita por tiempos y espacios diferentes en los que la realidad y la irrealidad se mezclan, representa la lucha definitiva del bien contra el mal.

programme.title: Mujer Maravilla
programme.desc: Diana, hija de dioses y princesa de las amazonas, nunca ha salido de su isla. Un día, en el contexto de la Primera Guerra Mundial, un piloto americano se estrella en su isla y Diana salva su vida; el piloto le explica que se está desarrollando una gran guerra que puede devastar el mundo, y Diana parte a la batalla.

programme.title: Manos a las armas
programme.desc: Miles es un desarrollador de videojuegos que, sin darse cuenta, se convierte en participante de un juego letal. Aunque Miles tiene una gran habilidad para escapar de todo, deberá enfrentarse a un peligroso asesino creado en su propio juego.

programme.title: Contagio
programme.desc: Cuando Beth Emhoff regresa a Minnesota de un viaje de negocios a Hong Kong, ella le atribuye su malestar al cambio de horario. Dos días después, Beth muere y los médicos le dicen a su esposo que no saben la causa de su muerte. Pronto, otras personas empiezan a mostrar los mismos síntomas y surge una pandemia global. Los doctores intentan contener al microbio letal, pero la sociedad empieza a colapsarse cuando los fanáticos de una bloguera provocan una paranoia.

programme.title: Misión rockstar
programme.desc: Aaron Green trabaja en una discográfica que le encarga la misión de volar a Londres y acompañar a una estrella del rock hasta el Greek Theatre de Los Ángeles, donde dará el primer concierto después de un tiempo alejado de los escenarios.

programme.title: El contador
programme.desc: Un agente del tesoro persigue a un contador que trabaja para varias organizaciones criminales. Mientras más cerca de su nuca siente el peso de la justicia, el contador va tomando medidas más drásticas para mantener a salvo su doble vida y su libertad.

programme.title: Julie & Julia
programme.desc: Frustrada por tener un trabajo que mata su alma, la neoyorquina Julie Powell se embarca en un proyecto atrevido: preparará todas las 524 recetas del libro de cocina de Julia Childs "Mastering the Art of French Cooking". Entrelazada con la historia de Julie está la verdadera historia de cómo Julia Child conquistó la cocina francesa con pasión, audacia y mucha mantequilla.

programme.title: Mundo acuático
programme.desc: Un marinero debe proteger a una niña contra los piratas que creen que su extraño tatuaje es el mapa hacia Dryland.

programme.title: Agente internacional
programme.desc: Un agente de Interpol y una abogada de Nueva York unen fuerzas para terminar con el financiamiento ilegal de un banco a un grupo terrorista.

programme.title: Broken City
programme.desc: Un exoficial de policía se involucra en un gran escándalo después de ser contratado para seguir a la esposa infiel del alcalde.

programme.title: Superman regresa
programme.desc: Mientras un viejo enemigo planea destruirlo de una vez por todas, el Hombre de Acero regresa después de una larga ausencia a un mundo completamente diferente. Lois Lane ha continuado su vida, y la sociedad ha aprendido a sobrevivir sin él. Superman debe encontrar la forma de regresar con ella y encontrar su lugar en un mundo que quizás ya no lo necesite.

programme.title: Mujer Maravilla

programme.title: La Santa Misa
programme.desc: Transmisión en vivo de la Santa Misa. Celebración católica en la que se renueva el sacrificio del calvario y se celebra el sacramento de la eucaristía. Por medio de la consagración del pan y el vino, el sacerdote entrega el cuerpo y la sangre de Cristo a los fieles, para el perdón de los pecados y el fortalecimiento de la fe. Celebración de la liturgia de la palabra y la liturgia de la eucaristía en donde se buscar alabar, agradecer y celebrar a Dios y a Jesús, reflexionando a partir de la lectura de las Sagradas Escrituras.

programme.title: Veredicto final
programme.desc: La moderadora del programa de realidad de una hora sobre asuntos legales es la jueza Cristina Pereyra. En este escenario que a la vez es una corte jurídica, en el que ella preside y modera entre el acusador y el demandado, ella utiliza su vasto conocimiento en el área del derecho, escucha a las dos partes y analiza las pruebas presentadas ante la corte con el fin de hacer su "Veredicto Final", como lo indica literalmente el título del programa. La honorable Jueza fue defensora pública anteriormente y luego estuvo encargada de presidir como Jueza en casos criminales, civiles, de familia y violencia doméstica entre otros, una experiencia que la llenó de gran sabiduría para arbitrar y solucionar los conflictos que las personas expusieron ante su corte.

programme.desc: Vítor y Albertano se dan cuenta de que se han gastado todo su dinero. Ahora tienen que pedirle comida prestada a sus vecinos para poder sobrevivir.

programme.title: Nosotros los guapos
programme.desc: Vítor y Albertano tienen que alquilar su departamento para obtener dinero, pero no es suficiente para continuar con su estilo de vida. Vítor trata de convencer a Albertano de que se haga novio de Bertha, una chica fea, pero multimillonaria.

programme.title: Trapped in Paradise
programme.desc: Anna, una mujer que acaba de enviudar, y su hijo de 12 años, Max, se van de vacaciones a un complejo de lujo en una isla remota con la idea de descansar y recuperarse de los duros momentos vividos. Un día después de instalarse en el lugar, unos criminales asaltan el hotel y los toman como rehenes, pidiendo una cuantiosa suma de dinero a la embajada de su país.

programme.title: La reina del flow
programme.desc: Erik se marcha a cumplir la cita con Juancho mientras Vanesa llora y le confiesa a Pite que cree que todo esto fue culpa de Ruko. Yeimy comprueba que Erik es su hijo..Erik cuestiona a Juancho.

programme.title: Veredicto final
programme.desc: La moderadora del programa de realidad de una hora sobre asuntos legales es la jueza Cristina Pereyra. En este escenario que a la vez es una corte jurídica, en el que ella preside y modera entre el acusador y el demandado, ella utiliza su vasto conocimiento en el área del derecho, escucha a las dos partes y analiza las pruebas presentadas ante la corte con el fin de hacer su "Veredicto Final", como lo indica literalmente el título del programa. La honorable Jueza fue defensora pública anteriormente y luego estuvo encargada de presidir como Jueza en casos criminales, civiles, de familia y violencia doméstica entre otros, una experiencia que la llenó de gran sabiduría para arbitrar y solucionar los conflictos que las personas expusieron ante su corte.

programme.title: Esta historia me suena

programme.title: Veredicto final
programme.desc: La moderadora del programa de realidad de una hora sobre asuntos legales es la jueza Cristina Pereyra. En este escenario que a la vez es una corte jurídica, en el que ella preside y modera entre el acusador y el demandado, ella utiliza su vasto conocimiento en el área del derecho, escucha a las dos partes y analiza las pruebas presentadas ante la corte con el fin de hacer su "Veredicto Final", como lo indica literalmente el título del programa. La honorable Jueza fue defensora pública anteriormente y luego estuvo encargada de presidir como Jueza en casos criminales, civiles, de familia y violencia doméstica entre otros, una experiencia que la llenó de gran sabiduría para arbitrar y solucionar los conflictos que las personas expusieron ante su corte.

programme.title: Contra viento y marea
programme.desc: Valente le exige a Ricardo que se aleje de Apolonia. Imanol pide formalmente la mano de Sandra y le entrega un anillo de compromiso. Valente le dice a Apolonia que apoyará a Sebastián haciéndolo líder del sindicato.

programme.title: Sortilegio
programme.desc: María José le dice a Paula que quiere contarle a Alex la verdad, pero ella cree que no es una buena idea. Alex lleva a María José y Paula al pueblo de su padre para conocerlo.

programme.title: Soy tu dueña
programme.desc: José Miguel le pide un préstamo a Moisés para pagar la deuda a Valentina. José Miguel le reclama a Leonor por el préstamo que le pidió Valentina. Alonso llega a la hacienda buscando a Valentina para pedirle que lo perdone por abandonarla.

programme.title: VH1 Shuffle

programme.title: Diamante de sangre
programme.desc: Mientras se desarrolla la guerra civil en Sierra Leona en los años noventa, dos hombres, un mercenario sudafricano blanco y un pescador, se unen para recuperar una gema extraña, de valor incalculable, que podría revertir el rumbo de sus vidas. Con la ayuda de una periodista estadounidense, los hombres se embarcan en un peligroso viaje a través de un territorio rebelde para lograr su objetivo.

programme.title: La gran estafa
programme.desc: Un carismático criminal recluta a un equipo de expertos ladrones para llevar a cabo un gran asalto en Las Vegas.

programme.title: Los indestructibles 2
programme.desc: El líder mercenario Barney Ross, Lee Christmas y el resto del equipo se reúnen con el Sr. Church, quien los contrata para un aparente trabajo sencillo. Pero las cosas salen muy mal, lo queobliga a los mercenarios a buscar venganza por la muerte de un camarada. Con la suerte en su contra, Barney y su equipo enfrentan una ola de destrucción de las fuerzas opositoras, solo para encontrarse con una amenaza inesperada: seis libras de plutonio para armas.

programme.title: Adult Swim
programme.desc: Los dibujos animados ya no son lo que eran, te hacen reír con malicia, los superhéroes perdedores, las parodias crueles y las golpizas, con humor inmaduro y violento parecido a la realidad.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Z Kai
programme.desc: Goku continúa su batalla con Frieza. Gohan intenta localizar a Bluma.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Z Kai
programme.desc: Kami y King Kai hacen un plan para restaurar el poder que concede deseos de las bolas del dragón Namekiano; Goku continúa su épica batalla con Frieza.

programme.title: Rescue Me
programme.desc: Tommy tries to ruin the finances of Janet's boyfriend; Chief Reilly faces suspension; Lou shares his poetry.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: El grupo se preocupa cuando reaparece la antigua admiradora de Sheldon, la doctora Ramona Nowitzki, mientras Amy se encuentra en Princeton.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy responde a la propuesta de matrimonio de Sheldon. Howard y Bernadette tienen problemas con una noticia inesperada.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: El empleo de Leonard está en juego cuando da una entrevista de radio embarazosa; Amy y Bernadette se unen para ocultarles sus éxitos a Sheldon y Howard.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon se siente agobiado por tener que elegir la fecha de la boda, pero Amy intenta convencerlo de que de su conducta depende que todo resulte más sencillo. Koothrappali y Stuart compiten por el amor de una compañera de trabajo de Bernadette.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Es Navidad y Phoebe se sorprende al enterarse de que su abuela le ha estado mintiendo sobre su padre, por lo que decide ir a buscar al hombre que la abandonó cuando era niña.

programme.title: The Flash
programme.desc: A Nora se le escapa información del futuro que devasta a Iris. Caitlin descubre algo sobre su padre. Barry le pide a Iris unir fuerzas.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: El exigente profesor de leyes de Christy la presiona demasiado; el plan de Bonnie para hacer que Adam elija el lugar para la boda fracasa.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Los chicos ven el video del baile de graduación de Monica y Rachel, donde ven la figura que tenía Monica, la verdadera nariz de Rachel y lo que Ross siempre ha sentido por ella. Joey le da a Chandler un horrible brazalete como muestra de su amistad.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross y Rachel pasan la noche juntos y se vuelven más que amigos. Monica cocina para la fiesta de un amigo de su padre, quien es un atractivo médico un poco mayor que ella.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: En la fiesta de cumpleaños del papá de Monica, todos están sorprendidos de que Richard salga con una chica veinte años más joven que él. Tras una pelea con Chandler, Joey decide mudarse del departamento.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A Leonard le molesta profundamente que su madre haya encontrado en Penny a su nueva mejor amiga. Por otra parte, Wolowitz y Sheldon encuentran algo en común que fortalece su amistad: el hecho de haber tenido padres decepcionantes.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon y Koothrappali le cuentan a Bernadette que no pueden manejar la situación, ahora que Amy y Wolowitz están trabajando juntos. Además, Penny y Leonard descubren, a través de quien menos lo esperaban, un secreto sobre Sheldon.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon se presenta a una audición para intentar obtener el papel del Profesor Protón. Penny cuida de Halley mientras Bernadette y Wolowitz siguen un tratamiento que les exige reposo en cama.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon trata de mantener en secreto su colaboración con Bert. Penny y Bernadette ayudan a Koothrappali a mejorar su relación con Ruchi.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Z Kai
programme.desc: Gohan entra a la pelea para vengarse por la pérdida de su padre; Dende se apresura para pedir deseo.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Z Kai
programme.desc: Goku y Freezer continúan con su épica batalla; Gohan espera noticias sobre el destino de su padre.

programme.title: El juego de la fortuna
programme.desc: Billy Beane, entrenador general de los Atléticos de Oakland tiene una epifanía un día: la sabiduría convencional del béisbol es incorrecta. Beane se enfrenta a un bajo presupuesto y debe reinventar a su equipo superando a los clubes más ricos. Une fuerzas con el graduado de la Liga Ivy, Peter Brand, Beane se prepara para desafiar las tradiciones de la escuela antigua. Él recluta a jugadores catalogados como malos por los buscadores de talentos.
